What it is: Interrupts default mental patterns tied to survival-based identity.
How to use it: Describe your coping strategies. Ask AI to find their survival root and rewrite a new pattern based on thriving.

What it is: Surfaces inner conflicts between belief and behavior.
How to use it: Describe an area of guilt or ambivalence. Ask AI to identify the contradiction and suggest an integration path.
What it changes: Reduces internal chaos and mental noise.

What it is: Detects invisible symbolic expectations causing chronic fatigue.
How to use it: List your inner demands. Ask AI which ones are based on invisible archetypes, projections, or inherited duty.
What it changes: Dissolves psychic exhaustion by rejecting false tasks.

What it is: Rebuilds the symbolic infrastructure of how you relate to safety, value, or time.
How to use it: Describe your daily stressors. Ask AI to trace the symbolic system underlying each and offer a redesigned model.
What it changes: Establishes a new architecture of self-regulation.

What it is: Turns a moment of humiliation into a sacred artifact of transformation.
How to use it: Describe a shame memory. Ask AI to symbolically sculpt it into a relic of strength.
What it changes: Converts psychic residue into talismanic power.

What it is: Reverses internalized binary thinking by flipping assumed polarities.
How to use it: List polarizing concepts (e.g., success/failure). Ask AI to generate new meanings for each side and collapse the binary.
What it changes: Breaks dualistic traps and expands inner nuance.

What it is: Maps ancestral patterns you’re emotionally, symbolically, or behaviorally continuing.
How to use it: Describe a life issue. Ask AI to simulate a generational ancestor with a parallel pattern.
What it changes: Links past and present in symbolic resolution.

What it is: Identifies talents or truths hidden in rejected self-aspects.
How to use it: Name a trait you disown or dislike. Ask AI what resource is buried inside it.
What it changes: Reintegrates exiled power and repressed insight.

What it is: Extracts embedded symbolic guidance from figures you admire.
How to use it: List people you idealize. Ask AI to extract the traits they represent and design an integration method.

What it is: Adjusts your relational orbit—who you revolve around and why.
How to use it: Describe your closest connections. Ask AI to reveal symbolic gravity patterns and realign your center.
